item.title: How do i code my 99 prayer command?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("99prayer") && command.length() > 5) { sendMessage("You've been restored 99pr"); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); }

Thats for 1-99 pray. But you want pray restoring?

Whats the ID for a prayer potion?
